QuestData.Title: For the Benefit of the Queen
QuestData.Description:
We safeguard our precious eggs to protect the future of all dragonflights. The Primalists do not simply threaten pain or anguish with their actions.
They threaten us with extinction.
I must inform our queen at once.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride with Majordomo Selistra to the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.RewardText:
ur face here after what you did. Once, you threatened the future of this dragonflight.
B

Objectives.Objective: Ride with Majordomo Selistra to the Ruby Lifeshrine
Show Queen Alexstrasza the infused egg
